text: @realDonaldTrump I don’t think I’ve ever despised anyone more than u in my life. For someone to blatantly BLOW OFF all the death, dying, suffering around US (not you). And YOU play a VICTIM, A LONE WARRIOR, how do u say that w a straight face. How stupid do u think we r? Ur UNGODLY! #COVID19
